title: KNOW YOUR BODY NATURE & BEHAVIOR
subtitle: BBA Test
description: Discover your body type and natural constitution
question: Question
testLockedMessage: You have already completed the test. You can view your results in your dashboard.

questions.text: When I look in the mirror, my body looks:
questions.hint: Your overall shape — slim, medium, or broad
options: Lean & slim
Average & balanced
Broad & heavy-set

questions.text: When I touch or feel my muscles, they feel:
questions.hint: Muscle bulk & firmness — lean, toned, or soft
options: Lean, not very muscular
Firm and toned
Soft but bulky

questions.text: My weight through life has been:
questions.hint: Do you easily gain fat or stay lean?
options: Hard to gain weight
Easy to gain and lose
Easy to gain but hard to lose

questions.text: My body burns energy or fat / my metabolism is:
options: Very fast
At a normal speed
Slowly
Long and narrow
Sharp or well-defined
Round and soft.

questions.hint: Do you easily gain fat or stay lean?
options: Is very little, skinny
Is balanced or average
Builds up easily (belly, hips, thighs)
Irregular — sometimes hungry, sometimes not
Strong — I feel hungry on time
Mild — I don't feel very hungry any time of the day
Gassy or bloated after meals
Acidic or burning after meals or after long hour fasting
Slow and heavy, feels heavy & lethargic after meals
Light and easily disturbed; and cannot sleep longer
Normal, undisturbed and refreshing (feels fresh after getting up)
Deep and long (I can sleep more than others), always refreshing

questions.text: My energy during the day is:
options: Up and down, sometimes very energetic, other times totally drained and the circle continues.
High and intense, very energetic throughout the day
Slow but steady, work or move with slower pace but constant energy throughout the day
Dry and rough, irrespective of seasons
Warm or sensitive (triggered allergy or reactions very easily)
Oily or thick (rarely face skin issues)
Cold easily, even when others feel normal
Hot easily, even when others feel normal
Comfortable in most weather

questions.text: My walking or talking style is:
options: Fast and restless
Clear and direct, confident
Slow and calm
Worrying or overthinking, anxious over small matters
Easily irritated angry or furious
Calm and patient even in adverse situations, I rarely panic or express anger

questions.text: My hair is usually (irrespective of seasons):
options: Dry or frizzy, less shiny
Fine-stranded, thin or straight
Thick, dense or oily, shiny

questions.hint: Confused, quick, or slow but sure?
options: Confused or change my mind often, difficult to reach any decision
Quick and sharp, quite decisive
Slow, take time to analyse situation and element of issues, but once conclude and decide on something, it's almost always permanent.
Hard or dry, need to put pressure to pass stool
Loose to semi solid, not so well-formed
Regular and well-formed, pass easily

questions.text: My work style is / I work best with :
options:
Creative and idea-based
(I generate ideas from scratch and use creativity to design my own way of working.)

Goal-focused and perfectionist
(I focus on executing ideas efficiently and delivering the best possible results, with high
quality and on time.)

Steady and patient
(I prefer using existing structures or systems and execute them consistently, calmly, and
reliably to achieve results over time)

questions.text: Recently, my mood (emotional energy) has been:
options: Anxious or restless on even small issues or matter
Irritated or angry quite easily, even on things which I could have ignored earlier
Low or dull, doesn't feel like doing anything or involving in any matter or people.
No major issues

questions.text: Recently, After meals, I predominantly feels:
options: Gassy or bloated
Acidic or burning
Heavy or constipated
No major issues
Take longer time to fall asleep, sleep breaks in between and not able to sleep longer
Less sleep at night and feels hot at night.
Sleeping for longer duration, yet feel dull
No major issues, sleep well.
Very dry or rough
Red, quietly irritated, or acne-prone (very sensitive)
Oily or dull
No major issues
Overthink or worry and get anxious
Get angry or react aggressively
Shut down or withdraw and keep things within.

questions.text: My Physical energy right now feels:
options: Nervous or unstable (Energy feels restless, shaky, or inconsistent.)
Strong but burns out fast (I have bursts of energy but get tired quickly).
Slow or heavy (Energy feels low, sluggish, or hard to activate.)
Stools are hard, dry, or not regular.
Frequent, loose stools or sudden urgency.
Digestion feels slow; stools are heavy or sluggish.
Bowel movements feel normal and regular.

questions.text: My food cravings are mostly for:
options: Cold or dry foods (Salads, cold milk, biscuits, dry snacks, leftovers.)
Spicy or salty foods (Chaat, pickles, namkeen, spicy curries, chips.)

Sweet or heavy foods (Mithai, halwa, kheer, sweets, fried foods like puri or
pakora.)
Dryness or stiffness (Dry skin, dry lips, joint stiffness, or cracking)
Heat or burning (Feeling hot, acidity, burning sensation, or inflammation.)

Mucus or heaviness (Congestion, excess mucus, bloating, or heaviness in the
body.)
No major issues (No noticeable or ongoing physical symptoms.)
emotionally sensitive and easily overloaded.
I react quickly, often with irritation or frustration.
numb, low, or disconnected emotionally.
My emotions feel balanced and stable.

questions.hint: Too many thoughts, sharp but stressed, or foggy?
options: Distracted or jumpy (I lose focus easily and my attention shifts often.)
Sharp but stressed (I can focus well, but I feel tense or pressured)
Slow or foggy (My thinking feels dull, heavy, or unclear.)
No major issues (My concentration feels normal and steady.)

questions.text: In the last 30 days, my body has:
questions.hint: Weight loss, heat, or weight gain?
options: lost weight, or my body feels dry or depleted.
been feeling warmer than usual or overheat easily.
gained weight, feel bloated, or notice swelling
No major changes

questions.text: Recently, I am experiencing discomfort mostly in:
options: Joints or nerves (Pain, stiffness, tingling, or nerve discomfort.)
Stomach or chest (Acidity, heartburn, or burning sensations.)
Sinuses, chest, or heaviness (Congestion, mucus, pressure, or feeling heavy.)
No noticeable or ongoing discomfort.

questions.text: My hunger in the last month has been:
options: Low or irregular (I don't feel hungry often, or my hunger comes and goes.)
I feel hungry frequently and strongly.
I crave food, especially sweets, due to emotions or stress.
My hunger feels balanced and regular.

questions.hint: Many ideas, urgency, or slow start?
options:
Scattered (want to do many things, but my energy and focus are scattered, making it hard
to start or complete anything)
Urgent or competitive (I feel driven, pressured, or eager to act and achieve quickly.)
Low or slow (I have little energy or motivation and prefer moving at a relaxed pace)

questions.text: Recently, Weather affects me like this:
options: I feel more dry in winter (winters are more hard to handle)
I feel more irritated in summer (summers are more hard to handle)
I feel heavy, dull and more uneasy in rainy season (Rain getting harder to handle)
Fast and jumping (Thoughts move quickly and shift from one idea to another)
Sharp but heated (Thinking is clear but tense, pressured, or easily irritated.)
Slow or stuck (My mind feels slow and kind of stuck.)
